mainTask.title: HT-003: UI Polish — Swift-Inspired Aesthetic (Dark-First, flagged)
mainTask.description:
Deliver a refined, enterprise-grade landing experience modeled primarily on runswiftapp.com—hero + product montage, feature chip grid, slider-style demo, testimonials—upgraded to a Dark default with Light/Dark toggle, subtle motion, and strong a11y/perf. All changes extend what already exists.

**Constraints & Guardrails:**
- ADAV is mandatory for each sub-task (AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY)
- No new frameworks/design systems/build tools without approval
- No duplication of component roles (extend/refactor existing primitives)
- Follow existing naming, routing, linting, and token conventions
- All visible changes behind FEATURE_UI_POLISH_TARGET_STYLE (off by default)
- Off-plan change → REQUIRES APPROVAL with justification + minimal alternative
- Provide precise backout steps for every change

**Status:** IN_PROGRESS
**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY
**Total Subtasks:** 6 major implementation phases
**Estimated Hours:** 24

metadata.constraints: No new frameworks without approval, extend existing primitives

success_criteria.layout_rhythm: Standardized via tokens; consistent section paddings

subtasks.title: Phase 1 — Theme System Enhancement
subtasks.description: Implement dark-first theme system with semantic tokens and proper contrast ratios.

subtasks.title: Phase 2 — Layout & Typography
subtasks.description: Implement Swift-inspired layout rhythm and clamp-based typography scale.

subtasks.title: Phase 3 — Component Enhancement
subtasks.description: Enhance existing components with full state matrix and Swift-inspired styling.

subtasks.title: Phase 4 — Motion & Interactions
subtasks.description: Implement subtle motion system with proper reduced-motion support.

subtasks.title: Phase 5 — Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize performance metrics and ensure Core Web Vitals compliance.

subtasks.title: Phase 6 — Verification & Polish
subtasks.description: Comprehensive testing, accessibility validation, and final polish.
